room_title: Escape room "Cannibal’s Den" by Quest Room in Los Angeles
review: We did the cannibal room and it was scary and so much fun! Our group worked together to find clues and help each other "escape" from the cannibal room. Everything looked so realistic and detailed. You'll have adrenaline pumping through you the entire time. There was a lot of effort out into production which ultimately helps it all seem realistic.

room_title: Escape room "Cannibal’s Den" by Quest Room in Los Angeles
review: Cannibal room was a very fun and very immersive experience. The puzzles were challenging without being frustrating. I plan on returning for their other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Cannibal’s Den" by Quest Room in Los Angeles
review: Amazing escape room! We did the cannibal den and it was great! Ben did a great job at making us feel scared when we entered the escape room! Very great experience!
